_source.text: A 2009 report by Gregory Elliehausen of the George Washington School of Business seconded the Federal Reserve study, noting that payday loans, while often costly, are "better than the alternatives."

text: A 2009 report by Gregory Elliehausen of the **George** **Washington** School of Business seconded the
Federal Reserve study, noting that payday loans, while often costly, are "**better** **than** the alternatives."

_source.text: Abraham Lincoln is credited with stating that it is better to keep silent and be thought a fool, than speak up and remove all doubt.

text: **Abraham** **Lincoln** is credited with stating that it **is** **better** to keep silent and be thought a fool, than speak up and remove all doubt.

_source.text: Abraham Lincoln It is better to give than to receive.

text: **Abraham** **Lincoln** It **is** **better** to give than to receive.

_source.text: Abraham Lincoln Our children deserve better than this.
Abraham Lincoln said it better than anyone today has said it: "Nothing stamped in the Divine Image was sent into the world to be trod upon."

text: **Abraham** **Lincoln** said it **better** **than** anyone today has said it: "Nothing stamped in the Divine Image was sent into the world to be trod upon."

_source.text: After all a lawyer who goes to a cheap law school is not that much better than a lawyer, like Abraham Lincoln, who went to no law school.

text: After all a lawyer who goes to a cheap law school is not that much **better** **than** a lawyer, like **Abraham** **Lincoln**, who went to no law school.

_source.text: '1753' isn't bad but '1755' is better, the red smoke really adds atmosphere - you only need 1 in the final 6. '1703' is a classic ' camera phone self portrait' shot, it works well.

_source.text: Abraham Lincoln, in the middle of the bloodiest war Americans ever fought, because it was the one they fought among themselves, knew better than to proclaim that he was a bosom buddy of the Lord:
